definition: Hunan Province in south central China, abbr. 湘[Xiang1], capital Changsha 長沙|长沙[Chang2 sha1]
lake/CL:個|个[ge4],片[pian4]
south
surname Nan
to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department

sentences.english: Flood and drought are the predominant natural disasters in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 水旱災害是湖南省最嚴重的自然災害。

sentences.english: Drought has caused major problems for boats that use the Xiangjiang River in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱給通過湖南省湘江河的船隻帶來嚴重的問題。

sentences.english: Huaihua city is an important forestry area in Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 懷化市是湖南省的重點林區。

sentences.english: I live in Yongzhou, Hunan Province, which is a very beautiful city.
sentences.chinese: 我住在湖南省永州市，這是個非常美麗的城市。

sentences.english: Furong District is located in Changsha, the capital city of Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 芙蓉區位於湖南省省會長沙市。

sentences.english: Changsha, capital of the chief province domain, has reportable power brownouts.
sentences.chinese: 據報道，湖南省會長沙已經限電。

sentences.english: Head of International Economic and Trade Translatoin Group of HuNan Translators' Association;
sentences.chinese: 湖南省翻譯工作者協會對外經貿翻譯組組長。

sentences.english: Shaoyang municipality is a major forest zone in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 邵陽市是一個重要的森林帶在湖南省。

sentences.english: Wangcheng is a county in the northeast of Hunan province and across the Xiangjiang River.
sentences.chinese: 湖南省望城縣，居湘中東北，跨湘江尾閭。

sentences.english: Deputy Chairman of Security Branch of Finance Association of LouDi City, HuNan Province.
sentences.chinese: 湖南省婁底市金融學會證券分會副會長。

sentences.english: At last, a model case, about the Meeting and Exhibition Industry Guild of Hunan Province, has been selected to support the explained theory.
sentences.chinese: 以湖南省會議展覽業協會爲對象，進行了案例分析。

sentences.english: This is from the Hunan Provincial Department of Finance recently received information.
sentences.chinese: 這是記者日前從湖南省財政廳獲得的信息。

sentences.english: This paper is a case study of Red Town in north of Hunan province.
sentences.chinese: 本文將湖南省北部地區紅鎮作爲田野個案。

sentences.english: Results The salt-iodine concentration in the residents of Hunan Province tended to decrease year by year.
sentences.chinese: 結果湖南省居民戶食鹽碘含量呈歷年降低趨勢。

sentences.english: Yuanjiang city lies in the north of Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 沅江市位於湖南省北部，瀕臨洞庭湖濱。

sentences.english: And Keyu No. 2 was examined and approved by the cultivar registration committee of Hunan province in 2006.
sentences.chinese: 於2006年通過湖南省農作物品種審定委員會審定。
